details.companyOverview: Health-tech company which provides at home Teeth Aligners and skin care service

responsiblities: Led the digital transformation, from web applications hosted EC2 applications to serverless applications
Responsible for creating and maintaining the Infrastructure of web application in AWS cloud
Development of NestJs based rest api microservices
Created and deployed serverless applications having Lambda functions, API Gateway, SQS and S3 using Serverless Framework
Development of NextJs frontend applications
Implemented CMS api caching to reduce NextJs application's build time from 15 minutes to 6 minutes
Ensuring the web applications meet the industrial security standards
Setup CI/CD for the development team using Github, Codepipeline, Codebuild and CodeDeploy
Migrated all applications from EC2 to ECS (Fargate)
Helped setup infrastructure for business launch in the UAE to ensure data residency compliance
Introduced Cloudformation and AWS CDK with Typescript for managing infrastructure as code

details.companyName: Tata AIG General Insurance Company Ltd.

responsiblities: Development of serverless microservices with API Gateway and Lambda functions

Conducted sessions to help developers learn to create and published npm packages for code modularity
Created coding guidelines and git flow management
Mentored and providing guidance to 3 Interns
Optimization and improvement of the development life cycle with AWS Codecommit

details.companyOverview: One of the leading companies in Life Insurance sector in India
